visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis should have categories 'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar' and the y-axis should represent sales data. The data series should include one series named 'Sales' with data points [29.9, 71.5, 106.4]. The chart should have custom colors for the series, with a background color of #f9f9f9 and a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart. The axes labels should be styled with a font size of 12px and a color of #333333.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis categories are set to 'Jan', 'Feb', and 'Mar', representing the months. The y-axis is titled 'Sales' and displays the sales data. The data series includes one series named 'Sales' with data points [29.9, 71.5, 106.4]. The chart has a custom background color of #f9f9f9 and uses a custom color (#008000) for the series. The axes labels and titles are styled with a font size of 12px and a color of #333333. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
